pos_mean_info_list.mean: 实证主义；实证论；积极性；武断
实证主义者；实证哲学家

word_mean_info__list.difference: 与sure同义，但语气比sure强，着重指有确切理由或不容置疑的证据所支持的确信。
语气强烈，指对自己的看法或作的结论的正确性有不可动摇的信念。
侧重主观上对某事确信无疑。

积极区别对待, 积极差别待遇

正相关性；正相关；呈正相关

bilingual.source: He made a positive comment on the design.
bilingual.target: 他对设计做了积极的评论。

bilingual.source: It has been an enormously positive force.
bilingual.target: 这一直是一个非常积极的力量。

bilingual.source: It has proved to be a positive influence.
bilingual.target: 它已被证明是一种积极的影响。

bilingual.source: Try to adopt a positive attitude towards life.
bilingual.target: 尝试对生活采取积极的态度。

bilingual.source: He has a positive philosophy of life.
bilingual.target: 他有一种积极的人生观。

bilingual.source: We need to maintain a positive spirit.
bilingual.target: 我们需要保持积极的精神。

bilingual.source: She has a positive attitude toward life.
bilingual.target: 她对生活有积极的态度。
新政策产生了积极的结果。

bilingual.source: Exercise has a positive effect on health.
bilingual.target: 运动对健康有积极的效应。

list.abstract: positive，英文单词，作形容词、名词，翻译为积极的、绝对的、正数等。

yingyinNormal.en: Perhaps you can think of this in a more positive light.
yingyinNormal.zh: 或许你可以用更积极的态度看待这件事。

yingyinNormal.en: It sounds scary, I know. But this surgery is actually a very positive choice for most people.
yingyinNormal.zh: 听上去是很可怕，我明白。但这项手术对大多数人而言是个积极的选择。

yingyinNormal.en: No. I'm just hoping to create a positive working relationship with him. What is that, a cat? And it's over.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不，我只希望跟他建立起积极的工作关系。这是啥？猫吗？结束了。

yingyinNormal.en: I think you mean positive punishment.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你是说正惩罚[施加负面刺激]吧。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, I see. Oh, you think that's a positive.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我懂了。你觉得这是一件好事。

yingyinNormal.en: It's actually the positive information that gets weighted more heavily.
yingyinNormal.zh: 事实上这种正面的信息会来得更重要。

yingyinNormal.en: How positive you are.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你真乐观。

yingyinNormal.en: Wait, Joy, you can get lost in there. Think positive. Okay. I'm positive you will get lost in there.
yingyinNormal.zh: 等等，"乐乐"，你会在那迷路的。乐观一点。好吧，我肯定你会在那迷路的。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh wow, so it's a really positive year. A really good year.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这一年真好。非常好的一年。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, I still have music in me, absolutely positive about that.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不过我还有着灵感，我非常非常确定。

yingyinNormal.en: You sure? I'm positive. It's all good. All right. Man, I am pumped.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你确定吗？确定。一切顺利。好吧。天啊，我好兴奋啊。

yingyinNormal.en: Girls, are you sure? Positive. We'll walk home. We almost died. Yeah.
yingyinNormal.zh: 姑娘们，真的吗？真的，我们走回家我们差点就死了。是啊。

yingyinNormal.en: Negative reinforcement is the removal of a positive stimulus. It's a common mistake.
yingyinNormal.zh: 负强化是指取消正面刺激[奖励]，这是个常见的错误。

yingyinNormal.en: Despite recent events, I do consider our experiment in cohabitation to have been positive.
yingyinNormal.zh: 撇开最近的事不谈，我的确觉得我们的同居实验得出了正面的结果。

yingyinNormal.en: What? Are you 100% positive you love and want to marry Howard Wolowitz? I do, with all my heart.
yingyinNormal.zh: 什么问题？你确定一定以及肯定你爱霍华德·沃罗威茨而且想嫁给他吗？当然，发自肺腑地想。

yingyinNormal.en: The only positive relationship this animal has is with that crane. At least she knows that means food.
yingyinNormal.zh: 而这头恐龙唯一拥有的感情羁绊就是和那台吊车了，至少她知道那意味着食物。

yingyinNormal.en: It backfired for Castro. 74% viewed your candidacy in a positive light, even with his wording. Stop, Eli.
yingyinNormal.zh: 结果和卡斯特罗希望的恰恰相反，74%的调查对象看好你作为候选人，而且是在如此不利的提问措辞之下。别说了，伊莱。

yingyinNormal.en: Yes. Maybe it's a false positive. Are you sure you peed on the stick right? How many ways are there to do that?
yingyinNormal.zh: 对，或许是假警报，你确定你尿在验孕棒的方式没错？不然我要怎么尿才对？

yingyinNormal.en: But I also want you to kick in a $250,000 credit line with 10% interest to be paid back in full once we meet net revenue positive.
yingyinNormal.zh: 并且我给你最多250000美元的投资限额投资回报率为10%从我们净收入为正的时候开始算。

yingyinNormal.en: And then when we finally got our first positive data, you were so happy. Oh, yes. In the world of emoticons, I was colon, capital "D."
yingyinNormal.zh: 接着终于测出一些可用数据时，你多高兴啊。是啊。用表情字符表达就是：D。

exam_freq_info.chinese: [语法]原级的(形容词; 副词)

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 积极效果；积极效应；正面效应

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 有把握地；明确地；确定地；毋庸置疑地；必定地；确实的

word_family.mean: adj. 实际的；实在的；真实的；毋庸置疑的；明确的；正电的；正片的；正像的；原级的；实证的；正的；积极的

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Positive</highlight> feedback is important for anyone to hear.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 积极的反馈对任何人来说都很重要。

examination_example.sentence: All of which would, of course, have a <highlight>positive</highlight> effect on our happiness levels.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当然，所有这些都会对我们的幸福水平产生积极的影响。

examination_example.sentence: But that's exactly the kind of false cheerfulness that <highlight>positive</highlight> psychologists wouldn't recommend.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但这正是积极心理学家不会推荐的那种虚假的快乐。

sense_info_list.en: of, containing, producing, or denoting an electric charge opposite to that carried by electrons
with no possibility of doubt; clear and definite

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 有把握地；明确地；确定地；毋庸置疑地；必定地；确实的

word_family.mean: adj. 实际的；实在的；真实的；毋庸置疑的；明确的；正电的；正片的；正像的；原级的；实证的；正的；积极的

sense_info_list.zh: 正面的; 积极的; 建设性的

examination_example.sentence: Companies can build customer loyalty by creating a <highlight>positive</highlight> culture of environmental awareness.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 企业可以通过创造积极的环境意识文化来建立客户忠诚。

examination_example.sentence: Indifferent relationships are neither <highlight>positive</highlight> nor negative.
examination_example.sentence_trans: “冷漠关系”这个概念既不是褒义的，也不是贬义的。

examination_example.sentence: Since a change in the course of action can sometimes be important and lead to a <highlight>positive</highlight> outcome.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因为行动过程中的改变有时是重要的，能带来积极的结果。

sense_info_list.en: with no possibility of doubt; clear and definite

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 积极响应；积极反应；积极答复

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 有把握地；明确地；确定地；毋庸置疑地；必定地；确实的

word_family.mean: adj. 实际的；实在的；真实的；毋庸置疑的；明确的；正电的；正片的；正像的；原级的；实证的；正的；积极的

sense_info_list.zh: 正面的; 积极的; 建设性的

examination_example.sentence: The students were actually very <highlight>positive</highlight> about the experience.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 事实上，学生们对这次体验的评价都非常积极。

examination_example.sentence: Thus, rising microwave sales could be seen as a <highlight>positive</highlight> thing
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因此，微波炉销量攀升可视为一件好事。

examination_example.sentence: He thinks AI will be <highlight>positive</highlight> for humans.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他认为人工智能将对人类产生积极影响。

examination_example.sentence: Dr. White said his team wanted to see whether living in greener urban areas had a lasting <highlight>positive</highlight> effect on people's sense of well-being or whether the effect also disappeared after a period of time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: White 博士说，他的团队想看看住在绿色城市地区是否对人们的幸福感具有持久的积极影响，或者这种影响在一段时间后是否也会消失。

examination_example.sentence: Living in an urban area with green spaces has a long-lasting <highlight>positive</highlight> impact on people's mental well-being, a study has suggested.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一项研究表明，生活在绿色区域对人们的心理健康有着持久的积极影响。

examination_example.sentence: UK researchers found moving to a green space had a sustained <highlight>positive</highlight> effect, unlike pay rises or promotions, which only provided a short-term boost.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 英国研究人员发现，搬到有绿地的地方会带来持续的积极影响，这与升职加薪不同，后者只会带来短期的促进作用。

examination_example.sentence: We found that for some lottery (彩票) winners who had won more than ￡500, 000 the <highlight>positive</highlight> effect was definitely there, but after six months to a year, they were back to the baseline.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们发现，对于某些中奖金额超过500英镑的彩票中奖者，肯定有积极作用，但是六个月到一年之后，他们又回到了基线。

examination_example.sentence: With a growing body of evidence establishing a link between urban green spaces and a <highlight>positive</highlight> impact on human well-being, Dr. White said, "There's growing interest among public policy officials, but the trouble is who funds it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: White 博士说：“随着越来越多的证据表明城市绿地与人类福祉的积极影响有关，公共政策官员对此越来越感兴趣，但问题是谁为此提供资金。”

sense_info_list.en: of; containing; producing; or denoting an electric charge opposite to that carried by electrons
with no possibility of doubt; clear and definite

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: The results showed that those who chatted with their server reported significantly higher <highlight>positive</highlight> feelings and a better coffee shop experience.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 结果显示，那些和服务员聊天的人表现出了更高的积极情绪和更好的咖啡店体验。

examination_example.sentence: You will want to continue to focus on <highlight>positive</highlight> choices.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你会想要继续关注积极的选项。

examination_example.sentence: Was <highlight>positive</highlight> news shared more often simply because people experienced more good things than bad things?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 正面的消息被分享得更频繁，仅仅是因为人们经历的好事比坏事多吗？

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 有把握地；明确地；确定地；毋庸置疑地；必定地；确实的

word_family.mean: adj. 实际的；实在的；真实的；毋庸置疑的；明确的；正电的；正片的；正像的；原级的；实证的；正的；积极的

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 积极能量；正面能量；正能量

examination_example.sentence: It helps people develop a <highlight>positive</highlight> lifestyle.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它帮助人们形成积极的生活方式。

examination_example.sentence: Another way of dealing with public speaking fears is using the audience's <highlight>positive</highlight> energy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 处理公众演讲恐惧的另一种方法是利用观众的正能量。

examination_example.sentence: She has a <highlight>positive</highlight> view of life.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她对生活有积极的看法。

examination_example.sentence: Right after the “stay at home” order, my mother tested <highlight>positive</highlight> for COVID-19.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 就在“居家”命令下达后，我母亲的新冠病毒检测呈阳性。
